text.content:
When a Player Character masters a Class by bringing it to level 10, that character may acquire one Heroic Skill from the list below.

  • Unless otherwise noted, each Heroic Skill may only be taken once — however, some Heroic Skills grow stronger as you reach certain levels.

  • Some Heroic Skills have requirements that must be fulfilled before you can acquire them, such as having mastered a specific Class.

Have fun and experiment with Heroic Skills and create unique combinations!

HEROIC SKILLS AVAILABLE TO ALL CHARACTERS

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.wr1if7rQttzxelbV]{Ambidextrous}

Fight with two weapons of different categories.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.okxC0Vg7jOXrEg6V]{Extra HP}

Increase your maximum hit points.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.VwPy5u5mcj9xLF6T]{Extra MP}

Increase your maximum mind points.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.RSacdfMknVY24eCH]{Extra IP}

Increase your maximum Inventory points.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.eNGAXzS3LaIrSukF]{Extra Spells}

Learn two spells from a Class of your choice.

HEROIC SKILLS WITH A CLASS MASTERY REQUIREMENT

Name

Class Mastery / Other Requirements

Summary

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.MoUQhgRVKo5HTqhl]{Adversity}

Darkblade

Status effects make you stronger.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.562YcXPjzRCWpeLh]{All You Can Eat}

Gourmet

Combine four ingredients into a delicacy.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.m5uGvbpdVfRmALod]{Arcane Echoes}

Arcanist

Arcana help you influence Clocks.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.hH6SHCiX0HAdXugI]{Arcane Mark}

1 or more among Sharpshooter, Symbolist, and Weaponmaster

Improve spells' critical chance with arcane weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.E3OppAz7I4f0g19B]{Arcane Soldier}

1 or more among Elementalist, Sharpshooter, and Weaponmaster; must know at least two offensive @ICON[offensive] spells.

Perform a free attack against a target, then immediately cast an offensive spell against them.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.DVaiA90aHgq9gPYI]{Auramancer's Refraction}

1 or more among Arcanist and Spiritist

Improves Aura and Barrier, and punishes enemies who damage protected targets.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.HsdYyIcbdvcleXQP]{Bend Magic}

1 or more among Elementalist, Entropist, Invoker, Symbolist

React to enemy spells with your invocations.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.sx1dhJqczTT4UkYw]{Bimagus}

2 or more among Elementalist, Spiritist, and Entropist; Level 30 or higher.

Cast one spell right after another, saving MP.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.iTh63cnp8IVawDwH]{Birth of the Cruel}

Necromancer

Turn a dead NPC into a Minion.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.OSJ4PCp6GmSnLaS3]{Black & White}

1 or more among Ace of Cards, Darkblade, Entropist, and Spiritist; must have acquired the Magic Cards Skill.

Modify your Double Trouble Set; Jokers become stronger.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.s316rQUTr3lgeTx7]{Blade Adept}

1 or more among Rogue and Weaponmaster

Gain bonuses with daggers and treat them as brawling, sword, and thrown weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.iZIhU35ZCZ1zrbfL]{Brainwave Discharge}

Esper

Erase your Brainwave Clock and deal damage.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.FvqC34UYxD3O2bFt]{Brambleheart}

1 or more among Darkblade and Floralist; must have acquired the Chloromancy Skills.

Your brambles protect you and react to enemy attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.eOGrMEqq2sBta0AN]{Brave Bash}

1 or more among Commander, Fury, Guardian, Pilot, Weaponmaster

Use Bone Crusher to challenge foes with a shield, then deal additional damage.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.ap1qHpIHqNFIKTsT]{Bullet Break}

Sharpshooter; must have acquired the Crossfire Skill.

Counterattack with firearms after using Crossfire.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.RD8MoXlaZMNolEnN]{Bullet Time}

1 or more among Entropist and Rogue; must have acquired one or more Skills among Dodge and Stolen Time.

Gain several benefits from Dodge and Stolen Time.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.6xjSns6UPuZcIbXs]{Card Vanguard}

Ace of Cards; must have acquired the Magic Cards Skill.

Place cards as Vanguard Cards.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.sSq9Z065pczkdBLZ]{Ceaseless Battlefield}

Commander

Halve the MP cost of Commander Skills.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.cSzzcGmQur0Zo6R5]{Cheer Up!}

1 or more among Chanter, Esper, Orator; must have acquired the My Trust in You Skills.

Improves My Trust in You.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.S64viyPBB8VsH9cQ]{Chimeric Mastery}

Chimerist

Learn spells from new Species and increase spell limit.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.nmeZ2ukzybP0lpR9]{Chimeric Soul}

1 or more among Chimerist and Mutant; must have acquired the Spell Mimic Skills.

Casting Chimerist spells grant benefits based on the Species.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.IgteRExMGSKQwg1G]{Clean Slate}

Symbolist

Remove spells and status effects from creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.KLo8fztm26jzY2Zn]{Cleansing Moonlight}

1 or more among Entropist and Spiritist

Your spells can remove status effects and spells from targets.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.zggGDIOSuvO8uzHg]{Comet}

Entropist

Learn the Comet spell.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.18sj4s6SHmfIicUj]{Decoy Bait}

Sharpshooter; must have acquired the Hawkeye Skill.

Hawkeye creates a decoy and grants a punishing attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.ca4n2hFwIzfP4F12]{Deep Pockets}

Tinkerer

Reduce Inventory Point costs.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.pcqTER5q2Mrcq0r4]{Disarming Rhetoric}

Orator

Persuade enemies to retreat.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.ibuohUO9YHDIId4x]{Double Arrow}

1 or more among Commander and Sharpshooter

Attack twice with bows.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.jdhnFWPhnFtLRLe8]{Dreamslice}

1 or more among Darkblade and Esper; must have acquired the Shadow Strike skill.

Shadow Strike reduces MP and causes action loss with swords.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.ngt7aBn7AykfzJDg]{Duel Master}

1 or more among Ace of Cards, Fury, Rogue, Sharpshooter, and Weaponmaster; must have acquired the Magic Cards Skill.

Your Magic Pairs enhance your attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.3Fxytf91dQuKMn74]{Dynamic Synchronization}

Pilot

Synchronize with another pilot or passenger to join forces.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.mYZHKPvfVmvZ4vNy]{Ephemeral Tranquility}

1 or more among Dancer, Esper, Rogue, Spiritist, Symbolist

Improves Hallucination and Torpor, and cleanses status effects to cause HP loss.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.6bLqejGbDDsGTj93]{Fast Rituals}

1 or more among Chimerist, Elementalist, Entropist, and Spiritist

Reduce the number of sections for Ritual Clocks in conflicts.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.W1UsYgp1MDCKkOV0]{Fleeting Moment}

Weaponmaster

Add High Roll when you Counterattack with a sword.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.VUOVB6ej86Ml3d1j]{Fitcast}

1 or more among Chimerist, Darkblade, Esper, Fury, Wayfarer

Use Might for Magic Checks, and treat weapons relying on Might as being arcane.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.UhjNswMk6idkCg0c]{Forbidden Rite}

1 or more among Ace of Cards and Arcanist;

Gain access to the Forbidden Monarch set. Your discards grant you strength.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.KT1FGhqeq1MYkrtJ]{For a Better Future}

Merchant; must have acquired the Real Treasure and Winds of Trade Skills.

Use Trade Points instead of Fabula Points and improve settlements with donations.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.mRwuLhNrlBLPKvoB]{Grand Summoning}

Arcanist; Level 30 or higher.

Summon Arcana as creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.JkU2SSeR5kMcDIXQ]{Greater Akromorphosis}

Mutant; must have acquired the Akromorphosis Skill.

Gain different benefits based on the Category of your unarmed strikes.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.Q2Xiuen9jKw7CEpW]{Greater Chloromancy}

Floralist

Increase magiseed effects and manipulate vegetation.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.gMC0t7NhWgv6BTcl]{Greater Ecdysis}

Mutant; must have acquired the Ecdysis Skill.

Ecdysis allows you to end status effects and spells.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.vwygOswBPj5vyiWN]{Greater Theriomorphosis}

Mutant; must have acquired the Theriomorphosis Skill.

Act after Theriomorphosis.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.nm6Ec7nbsrNlRZCf]{Green Thumb}

Floralist

Quicken or delay the growth of your magiseeds.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.pqT5C8ap91WD7TDf]{Harvester of Sorrow}

1 or more among Entropist and Necromancer; must have acquired both the Drain Spirit and Drain Vigor spells.

Increase the potency of Drain spells.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.8Djx8D9cU36qHQYz]{Heartbreaker}

Darkblade

Sacrifice HP for massive damage.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.BD2TjjMN3s8DfZEu]{Heroic Companion}

Wayfarer

Your Faithful Companion grows stronger.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.IMg6ssWeH5hyBtIi]{Hit the Nerve}

1 or more among Chanter and Orator; must have acquired the Condemn Skill.

Use Condemn to inﬂict enraged and gain beneﬁts against enraged creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.kAoA3OAXH6E6tt9I]{Hope}

Spiritist

Learn the Hope spell.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.sEXgOpgUF00z55Y3]{Hoplite}

1 or more among Commander or Guardian

Strengthen attacks when you fight with weapon and shield.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.FPzCCSJAdIwVLVqB]{Inner Wellspring}

Invoker

Carry an elemental wellspring of your choice within yourself.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.9ga5k07i5o6nEE1c]{Iron Forest}

1 or more among Commander or Weaponmaster

Force enemies to spend MP to act after hitting with a spear.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.dwmA3TWb8Ya3VSDZ]{Magic Guard}

1 or more among Chimerist, Elementalist, Entropist or Spiritist

Negate enemy spells while you are in Guard.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.p8vmh280ByFh88tK]{Make it or Break it}

1 or more among Darkblade and Fury.

Double the HR of an attack but risk damaging the weapon.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.oedqQdAvlhW6VCPh]{Mathemagic}

Loremaster

Extend single target spells.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.8vzHUmPg4Cksad7D]{Mimeoclepsis}

1 or more among Chimerist and Mutant; must have acquired the Genoclepsis and Spell Mimic Skills.

Learn spells through the Mutant's Genoclepsis.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.zwoUkVKrKQHZzVHV]{Monkey Grip}

Fury

Equip some two-handed weapons in a single-hand slot.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.2bYmGoMPJ8jNP8hP]{Nebulization}

Tinkerer; must have acquired the advanced Alchemy benefit from the Gadget Skill.

Your potions are strengthened by repeated use.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.nvR7qGeOaTNe4F9n]{Overload Burst}

Pilot; must have acquired the Compression Tech Skill.

Perform an additional action, then leave the vehicle.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.h8keSqFfvEilNhF7]{Paso Doble}

Dancer

Ignore the MP cost of Follow My Lead when you are in Crisis.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.ZfAZkP1rc6RrFjre]{Perfect Aim}

Sharpshooter

Choose two options when using Warning Shot.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.ZwYXOZJHtRxsmHXl]{Pillage}

Rogue

Steal from multiple creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.2BCHomNzOGzj2SNa]{Power Chord}

Dancer

Improve allies’ critical success chance with songs.

Take a little nap during a conflict to regain your energies.

1 or more among Guardian, Merchant, Wayfarer

Take a little nap during a conflict to regain your energies.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.LDgRVXFVnUdJTvit]{Powerful Shot}

Sharpshooter

Deal extra damage at range.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.lYKani6s0f2C8vqA]{Powerful Spell}

1 or more among Chimerist, Elementalist, Entropist and Spiritist

Deal extra damage with spells.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.BsWM80bfvYRZjbED]{Powerful Strike}

1 or more among Fury and Weaponmaster

Deal extra damage in melee.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.r6EWpIcwbMmH3u42]{Predictable!}

Loremaster

Force an enemy to spend MP to perform specific actions.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.3h38Nob5B8AWsexP]{Psychic Field}

Esper

Extend some of your psychic gifts to your allies.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.rbs7azAWkb9MwSXi]{Pulse of the Maggots}

Necromancer

Grave Points modify your Affinities.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.DppL1AyvffBGbjDM]{Pulverizing Strike}

1 or more among Darkblade, Fury and Weaponmaster

Breach deals more damage with heavy weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.7X5Douk1Esbc0LJf]{Quantum Magicannon}

Tinkerer; must have acquired the advanced Magitech benefit from the Gadget Skill.

Improve your magicannon and use it for an explosive attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.6UzPwOYtyU0inH48]{Quick Scan}

Loremaster

Examine multiple creatures.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.RhoZgyaCPn1IPixe]{Rampart}

Guardian

Resist damage and status effects during the first round.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.qi4qlidm2Dg7R99X]{Repetition}

Orator

Condemn or Encourage twice.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.tY6Y0EW7JPP80flT]{Revelation}

Arcanist

Bind a previously unknown Arcanum, and improve dismiss effects.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.8tBwzNz4egN1Lu4L]{Rising Tide}

1 or more among Fury and Weaponmaster

Gain benefits for consecutive attacks with brawling weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.kxGTMBIvlLKM50Wa]{Ritual Seals}

Symbolist

Place Rituals into seals with contingency activations.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.A0NEGshlzb52Tv7h]{Showstopper}

Dancer

Perform three dances, then take a temporary break.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.v2oHTRDdfnDEXURD]{Side by Side}

Wayfarer; must have acquired the Faithful Companion Skills.

Improve your synergy with your Faithful Companion.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.1jiLF3jy7eEinL1k]{Silent Hunter}

1 or more among Rogue, Sharpshooter, Weaponmaster; must have acquired the High Speed Skills.

Improve High Speed with bows, spears, and thrown weapons, and deny free attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.1wnsaeyJ46ElqvPX]{Skillful Dosage}

1 or more among Gourmet, Loremaster, Merchant, Tinkerer

Delicacies, potions and spells heal above maximum HP and MP.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.HMQApiczSy0sas6z]{Specialty of the House}

Gourmet

Prepare a unique delicacy with alternative effects.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.aFS46NM5EYoywktL]{Status Immunity}

Wayfarer

Ignore a status effect.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.m6MWTDpEJqEMAb5a]{Steel Witch}

Pilot

Gain beneﬁts when you cast spells on a personal vehicle

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.LaGJKkBP3v61ra1v]{Strength of Five Wellsprings}

Invoker

Invocations improve Attributes.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.8Y5cFfBejJdnj9bb]{Spider’s Web}

Weaponmaster

Attack twice with flails.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.WKJ4ZSPBnlg4U3qt]{Swirling Swarm}

1 or more among Dancer, Fury, and Sharpshooter

Gain benefits for consecutive attacks with thrown weapons.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.MNSD1FKJfOk8BCKr]{Tabula Rasa}

Commander

Your Skills cause HP loss in Crisis.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.eRWAdOPqb5aU9k9x]{Tempest Strike}

Weaponmaster

Concentrate multi attacks on a single target.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.HEOsMRPIujE75Sll]{Theme Song}

Chanter

Gain a Theme Song with a variety of benefits.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.awqSSh3rbNZW8L5V]{Triple Slash}

1 or more among Dancer and Weaponmaster

Equip three daggers/swords and perform triple attacks.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.Njj84qeVxijnlVB9]{Unbreakable}

Guardian

Survive a fatal hit once per scene.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.xbTcxx4ysOWOamZP]{Upgrade}

Tinkerer

Modify equipment abilities.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.RRKlW2mwN7sA8YJh]{Vanish}

Rogue

Disappear after an attack.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.FpTkfuZ5p4zCQKDP]{Volcano}

Elementalist

Learn the Volcano spell.

@UUID[Compendium.projectfu.heroic-skills.Item.3wlO92LRBQOzfEB7]{Wise Counsel}

1 or more among Commander, Loremaster, Orator

Your Support Checks grant extra benefits to the leader.

When a Player Character masters a Class by bringing it to level 10, that character may acquire one Heroic Skill from the list below.

  • Unless otherwise noted, each Heroic Skill may only be taken once — however, some Heroic Skills grow stronger as you reach certain levels.

  • Some Heroic Skills have requirements that must be fulfilled before you can acquire them, such as having mastered a specific Class.

Have fun and experiment with Heroic Skills and create unique combinations!

CORE RULEBOOK

HEROIC SKILLS AVAILABLE TO ALL CHARACTERS
